Cloud Engineering Co-Op: As a Cloud Engineering Co-op, you'll gain hands-on experience implementing cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure, identity and authentication systems, developer tools, and observability frameworks. You'll help design and build tools and automations that run on distributed systems, identifying opportunities to streamline manual workflows through automation. Your work will include performing root cause analyses and proposing engineering solutions to prevent or mitigate recurring incidents. You'll also participate in design and code reviews, contributing to the development of scalable, high-performance systems that support our engineering teams The standard base pay range for this role is 65,000 CAD annually. This value is the expected annualized base pay of interns in British Columbia, Canada.
